About Puma Epoch Full Zip Hooded Sweatshirt
As the wise ol' saying goes, never forget where you came from. So we stamped the coordinates of PUMA HQ on the back of this Epoch men's hoodie; that way, they'll never slip anyone's mind. A drawcord around the hood means you can adjust the fit, and you can store small items in the two pockets at the waist. A reflective PUMA Cat Logo sits on the front to boost visibility in low light conditions.
